website_summaries.verdict: This model offers the ability to charge multiple accessories in a well-designed, nice-looking unit available in multiple colors.
pros: Unlike some models, the BEACOO dock accommodates standard Apple lightning cables
The additional space for charging AirPods is a great feature, and the 45-degree Apple Watch stand allows for use in "nightstand mode."
The stand looks great on a bedside table or desk, and is available in three different colors
cons: Each charging station requires a separate USB port, meaning users will need three ports to charge all three devices

customer_reviews.title: Organization Bliss :)
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs up! It’s plastic but very good quality. Assembled it rather easily. Other reviews helped - as they mentioned, you need to use Apple cables bc the slots are small, our generic cables did not fit. Yes you need 3 separate cables but they are all nicely hidden and organized under the stand. My only con is I wanted it in white, so I’m thinking it’s all white, right? No! it has 2 little annoying black rubber things meant to hold the phone in horizontal position. Whyyyy!?
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely neat and useful! Great product if you’re like me and are obsessed with things looking organized and having everything in one piece! Great material, great quality! Super easy to assemble too!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Tamez

customer_reviews.title: Looks nicer in pics but still use it daily.
customer_reviews.text: It looked good online and when I received it, it looked and felt cheap, it’s just matte plastic nothing special or fancy. But it does work well for the intended purpose. So if you don’t care much for aesthetics and more about functionality, you can’t really go wrong. Don’t regret buying, I guess in retrospect I should have paid a bit more money for something more aesthetically pleasing. But all in all a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Maybee

customer_reviews.title: Good for consolidation
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is one of the best at-home accessories I’ve ever bought. It gets all of my charging done in one place and it’s easy to reach over and grab my gear even while I’m still in bed. Super easy to install as long as you keep all of the factory charging cords that come with your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods. I have an Otterbox Defender case on my iPhone X and with the largest iPhone cable extender, it charges it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I did have to assemble some parts on my own, but it makes sense to have it done that way. There are a few different options depending on the type of phone case you have so you don't have to worry about it not working if you have a certain case or if you purchase a new one. It keeps all my cords neatly ran underneath and to my multi-usb port on the back of my nightstand. Will be buying another one soon for my son because I like it that much!
customer_reviews.author: It's Me VC

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have a ss watch. It might be too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but poor design. Watch stand is tilted too forward which makes the watch fall. I have a ss 44mm Magnet on the charger does not help nor does the little stoppers on the bottom of the watch dock
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Need your own separate cord for each device you plan on letting sit on this hunk of plastic
customer_reviews.text: The product is deceiving, thought I was going to have a charging stand that would accommodate each of my devices. Instead I had a hunk of plastic, that I could put together, then weave and intertwine 3 or 4 different charger cords into. And my devices could just sit on it. I wouldn’t be able To easily move cords around or Take them with me if needed because Every cord I Own would be attached to this hunk of plastic! If I wanted to plug in 4 cords to my wall to plug into my devices that that’s what I would have done. This is a waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I love having a station for all of my stuff. I had no problem assembling it, and it's held together well. It charges my airpods, iphone, and apple watch with no problems. My watch does not fall or does not have problems charging because there's "too much plastic" on the charging stand. I have a series 4 watch, so I'm not sure if this is only a problem with older watches but it has not effected me. One thing I will say is that it's important to have apple brand chargers, since it doesn't seem like any other charger would fit in this stand. Overall, I'm very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Plumley

customer_reviews.title: Apple Product Stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand is very nice, especially for the price. It has clear instructions for putting it all together and even comes with a little screwdriver. It takes about 10-15 mins all together. It looks very sleek and holds everything together very nicely. It charges my watch even with case on it and the phone stand is adjustable for however thin or thick your case is. Make sure you have 3 apple cords or other ones that are similar size. My original phone cord was a thick braided cord and those do not fit, just an FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it requires three device cables to make ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it requires three device cables to make it work. You have to find a triple gang usb plug in to make things tidy. Wish they made one that was just one simple 110 cord to plug into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel watch won’t charge.
customer_reviews.text: The charging station is a novel idea, but I found as previous reviews state that the charging for the apple stainless steel watch downer work, many times last week, I would put watch on charger appeared to be charging and in the morning battery would almost be dead as it lost contact between watch and charger. So I had to go with out a watch 3days last week. Since I have removed the charger and have gone back to charging on the night stand. I think if two small brackets would be incorporated to hold watch in place would solve the issue. Phone charges works great and so does the holder for the Airpods. Overall dissapointed with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: izzy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I like that my devices are charging in one place and the design is cool. The space between the watch and phone component is also perfect for my reading glasses, so that’s a plus for me too. It was easy to put together and my only issue is that when I’m taking my phone off the charger, I have to hold the base down to avoid lifting the whole charging station off the table. I wouldn’t mind a little more weight in the base to eradicate that issue. I’d recommend this product and it would make a nice inexpensive gift too.
customer_reviews.author: Gay

customer_reviews.title: Just a plastic stand, does not charge
customer_reviews.text: You will need 3 separate charging cables threaded into this to actually make it a charging stand. Otherwise its just a display stand. I don't need a display stand. If you do need a display stand or wish to go to the trouble to thread 3 cords into it, the unit is sturdy and comes with tools for easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Sftonyt

customer_reviews.title: CAN USE ONLY APPLE CORDS
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this device and use it for my charging station. I ordered extra cords off of amazon to make sure that i would have enough (car charger, boyfriends house charger, work charger, etc.) but if your cords are NOT APPLE PRODUCED cords do NOT get this. None of the extra cords that i ordered fit correctly in this charging station making it useless until i can get apple products.... which is pretty annoying in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Fordyce

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, but off brand cables don’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product. Really cleans up my nightstand and seems like it’s super well made. Everything works really well. My only complaint is that it’s not really compatible with any cable other than official Apple cables as most others are too large to thread through the holders. Interchangeable parts were provided, but not really in the areas they were needed. Plan on buying Apple cables when you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo

customer_reviews.title: Everything You Need!
customer_reviews.text: This dock is practical, easy to set up, and will satisfy your every charging need! Construction of the dock is clearly explained in detailed instructions, and comes with all the tools you need with extras! (hello cute screwdriver) The build feels sturdy, and the iPhone dock is easily customizable based on what case you have on your home. The dock is built to be incredibly flush with your tech. I've had no issues with my watch staying in place, or having wobbly parts. My only note is that you MUST have the charging cables provided by Apple, otherwise it will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Need OEM Chargers
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product in theory, but if you don't have OEM charging cables for your product (at least $30 a pop) the charging cable head will stick up high above the port, so your phone/airpods will not rest on the stand. Instead, the phone/airpods is sitting on top of the charger. Also, you can't remove your phone or pods single handed. You need both hands to hold the stand down, otherwise the whole thing comes up and pulls all the cables. This probably wouldn't happen if the stand was heavier. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Monreal

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put phone on at night. 2 hand operation
customer_reviews.text: You have to use your own cables. The item is functional it came in a very nice box with the tools to install it and easy instructions. It is not easy to get your phone put into it it takes me two hands and I have to pick the entire item up to get it lined up correctly. It is very stable and holds my phone with eight cookies and credit card pouch on it. The watch portion works well I had to put the holder stick on because my watch was too heavy and would slide down. That was a great feature to include.
customer_reviews.author: Shell 1972

customer_reviews.title: Not for new models
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone X Max did not fit the stand nor did my AirPod Pro. I didn't try my Apple Watch. Worse of all was the charging cables for each device was still required. So there are three cables coming out of the bottom of the stand that need to be connected to three wall charger adaptors. I admit I'm not a diligent shopper. I look at the pictures and buy from what I see. In this case I presumed it was a charging dock and had but one connecting cable to the wall charger. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: staynavytom

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love that it organizes your power cords and gives you different options for using with or without a case on the phone. Color was spot on, I got pink. The only slight issue is the phone charging part does not allow the phone to lean flat on the back rest so, this makes it put some slight pressure on the charger while plugged in and the Apple watch charger sometimes needs a tiny adjustment. For the price its good. No issues that would make me want to return it. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: misty mccrary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together! You even get the tool you need in the box. This really fixed the problem when I’m low on my phone battery and I have to video chat with someone. I don’t have to physically hold my phone for an hour or make it upside down in order to charge my phone. And the bottom avoid a mess of cable just laying around.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Rei

customer_reviews.title: Great for my accessories
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to consolidate all of my gadgets in one place. Easy to assemble. Not something i would travel around with. The pieces needed to make adjustments for phone size and cases are too easily to get lost or broken in travel. Only thing I would say I don’t like when I want to watch a series and need to charge buy can’t because of the angle. Another than that I really love the ability to have everything charging in one place at night and to be able to pick it up and go in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: BluMethal

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The stand works fine. Not the best quality material, but fair for the price. My biggest issue was that it was supposed to have four 0.5in screws included, but it did not. Thankfully I had some at home and was able to use them but it was still I completely sent to me. Also, my iPhone XR will not fit on the charging station with the case even with the number 4 attachment which is meant for my type of case. So, I’ll use it for my Apple Pencil instead. I’m a bit disappointed though.
customer_reviews.author: J&E Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Apple Watch constantly loses connection
customer_reviews.text: Apple Watch constantly loses connection when I have it attached to the power connection in this thing. This is because this holder makes it so that the watch is hanging vertically all of the connector, so it can never get a good connection. It needs to lay horizontally on the connector. This flaw makes this apple product holder useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Avilla

customer_reviews.title: Convenience of Keeping Them together
customer_reviews.text: What a pain to have two different charging cords and typically not having a spot to keep both cords in the same area. This combo unit makes sense and is convenient. they provide different mounting bases for your phone cord, so you can find the right mounting distance based on your phone case (e.g. Otterbox). One thought to consider, this does not travel well, so you will probably want to buy a spare lightning cord for both your phone and your watch.
customer_reviews.author: Damo

customer_reviews.title: Once set up good but awkward to get set up
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice to have a stable place to connect all my devices, unfortunately it doesn’t hold after market cords. The watch spot works well and holds my watch in place so I can see it at night when it’s dark. The iPhone spot is good but it will not work with non iPhone connector cords. The head of the lightning cord is too thick so you need to use actual iPhone charge cords or one with a small connection. Also it is tough to get the cord to stay in the track
customer_reviews.author: Amber C

customer_reviews.title: Great for Airpods and watch, not so great for modified phone
customer_reviews.text: I got this because each day I was reaching for 3 different chargers for my devices. This was a nice neat organizer, and had easy-to-plug-in ports. I love it for the watch and the Airpods... it works great for those. The phone part would be great, but... I have Mophie (extended battery case) on my phone, and it uses the mini-USB and they don't provide spacers and adapters for mini-USB ports. So I cannot use this stand for my phone. Otherwise, a really nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P Girard

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. It’s cheap and flimsy plastic. When I take my iPhone off the whole thing falls off the table. The Apple Watch charger doesn’t keep the watch straight and I feel like that could eventually cause damage to the battery. It looks cool in the pics but not so much in real life. Also, for the price of this plastic it should have came with some kind of port to connect all three cords.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch holder does not work
customer_reviews.text: See the angle of that watch is on there? See the way that the watch is on there? There is no way to put a watch on the charger to have it charge. The angle is too steep. There is nothing there to hold the watch in place. The watch charger disc that you have to supply sits too low in the holder to make contact with the watch. You will wake up in the morning with a dead watch.
customer_reviews.author: PLowder

customer_reviews.title: Well Thought Out!
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed with how well thought out the unit is. It comes with a variety of different sized inserts so your phone will fit as well as it even came with a small screwdriver to put one of the pieces in. I appreciated that everything was included and they thought to provide different options for various cases. Everything looks very tidy now and my OCD is loving it. It even comes with a Velcro cable tie to tie all the cords together!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I thought...the cords do not stay put in their selective grooves and the overall quality is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT INCLUDE SINGLE OUTLET PLUG IN
customer_reviews.text: You need to put in your own charge for each piece you use, iPhone? Need a charger plugged into the wall and routed into the stand for that. Watch? Need another cable plugged separately into the wall and routed into the stand for that as well. AirPods? Need ANOTHER cable plugged into the wall and routed into the stand for that. Yay for THREE CABLES all plugged into three separate outlets on your wall! DO NOT RECOMMEND. If this had all that included and plugged into ONE outlet on the wall, EASY 5 stars. Otherwise this is no help and just puts everything in one place. Not that hard to do without this dumb shit.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Goolsby

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, disappointing product for me.
customer_reviews.text: **Update: the seller is great and stands behind the product. Full refund and offers to find an improved solution. I like the seller, wish the product was better. This looks nifty and that it would make for great organization, but it’s cheap and the lack of power consolidation causes more clutter than it’s worth. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Eldonaldson

customer_reviews.title: Bedside Table Necessity
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my bedside table and it is so easy to charge all my devices at once! I love that it uses the actual chargers the items come with and isn't wireless because with the case I have on my phone I need to have a charger I can actually plug in to my phone. I also love that it comes with very detailed instructions for set up!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Once I opened the package, I was concerned about the number of pieces to assemble for the charging station. The instructions were easy to follow that the station came together seamlessly. It looks great and keeps my Apple products together neatly while charging. My only concern is when taking my phone off the charger. It is tight and directions warn not to wiggle the phone side to side when removing. This is nearly impossible but may be easier when time goes on. I would definitely recommend and will probably purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Laurena Riedl

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute stand that works very well! It is a bit difficult to assemble (I had my sister who's a mechanical engineering student assemble it for me). Once it is together I would not recommend disassembling to travel or anything. It was a very awkward shape to try and pack, but it work well enough to tuck in with clothing or the likes. Great to keep your bedside table organized and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand cause I had recently purchased an apple watch and headphones. I really like how all of the cords fit nicely under the stand. I have it on my nightstand and it has helped to keep all of the chargers under control. The only drawback is the phone charger cord is not very sturdy in the stand and it can be a bit hard to connect, other then that I am really enjoying the charger stand. I purchased the rose color, but I think I should have gotten black.
customer_reviews.author: Sabra

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So I want to start off saying I love this dock, construction is solid instructions are easy, looks beautiful on a nightstand. My one and only issue is that my crazy thick case makes it impossible for me to charge my phone on the dock, I was able to do a little self modification and it charges my phone just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Stocking stuffer for my wife and it's already met its demise....she spent some time trying to get it adjusted but the cables would pull out when trying to undock the phone and she had some issues with the watch charging reliably as the charger's puck seems to sit fairly deep in the opening. Shimmed it out some and it was good but seemed like you needed to do a lot of tweaking to get the thing 'ok'
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great for all apple devices!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! It has a place to charge his air pods, watch and phone all in one place. He loves that it is compact so it doesn't take up a lot of space on his desk, and when he has gone to stay over night at friends, he can take all his chargers in one piece and doesn't have to worry about anyone taking his cord! It is sturdy, and good looking!
customer_reviews.author: lisez2

customer_reviews.title: A Great Birthday Gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a 22nd birthday. The product arrived damage free. The product itself is nice. The plastic is not the best plastic I have ever seen/felt, but it’s not going to fall apart after a week. After setting the product up, everything worked and charged as expected. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrstin Teeter

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stand, Not Wireless Charger Stand
customer_reviews.text: I must admit, I didn’t read the product description carefully so I was a bit surprised that it wasn’t a wireless charging stand when I opened the box. However, it’s a nice stand. Instead of having 3 cables randomly lying on my nightstand and having to fidget with them to find the right charger for the right device, my charging cables fit in the stand nicely and there’s no confusion. Each device and cable has their own spot. The only drawback I see will be having to undo the cables from the stand when I travel. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: .... Mixed Feelings
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Love the set up of this product. Cons - Had to buy an additional wall outlet to plug in all the plugs to an outlet. Difficult to charge any of the items due to the placement of the chargers You have to supply your own charging cords and it was a pain to put together There are definitely more cons to this product then there are pros, but I LOVE the set up. 100% the reason I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product description
customer_reviews.text: I feel very sorry for myself that I didn’t read 1 star reviews for this product. I just was impressed with 4 star rating based on more than 1000 reviews. This is not a charging station- just a stand where you can organize all your cords. A little bit OVERPRICED for that purpose. Sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Tati S.

customer_reviews.title: It's plastic - read carefully
customer_reviews.text: I figured for the price it wasn't going to be much but this is very light and not worth the price. I bought a simple electronic device holder from the store that was less than half this price and sturdier. Didn't return it because I felt like they didn't deceive me. I got exactly what they advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Vera N.

customer_reviews.title: A Love/hate relationship
customer_reviews.text: I have a love/hate relationship with this dock only because it’s really difficult to put your phone on the phone stand if you have a pop socket and thick phone case. Also, if you have a silicone case on your AirPods case it will likely not fit in the slot for the AirPods. BUT I do love that this stand keeps all my gadgets organized even if it’s not super easy for me to use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Read update
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return this, I just waited too long because I kept it in the package until I moved. But it’s a really bad product, your Apple Watch doesn’t stay in the stand at all and it’s kind of difficult to put it together and it just ended up being a waste of space on my nightstand. Update: they sent me something to put under the watch so it wouldn’t fall off and I’m much happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic; not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. SUPER cheap hard plastic (think model car type plastic). Too light, so even with the grippy pad on the bottom you still get movement. Just do yourself a favor and buy the wood/bamboo versions. You can always paint those if you don’t like the wood look. Definitely a cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill U.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit anything
customer_reviews.text: Several things wrong with this. First I only gave it two stars because it is a great way to keep organized but: 1- it doesn’t come assembled 2- it doesn’t fit USB-C to Lightning cables. 3- It doesn’t fit Air Pod Pro case Bottom line is if you intend on upgrading any Apple products anytime soon you’ll be wasting your money on this because it doesn’t fit anything but the watch
customer_reviews.author: Steve Goeller

customer_reviews.title: Wireless is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this and having to insert three charging cords, I realized I need a wireless charger. The airpods charge rather quickly, so it isn't necessarily needed on a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Hovan

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand is made of hard plastic. My phone is bulky due to having an otter box so it would not stay in place as it should. With that being said, for proper placement I had to remove my phone from its case which really isn’t a big deal. Overall I was satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough set up. Wish it didn't' require three separate cables/power bricks
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived I was a little confused with all the pieces, but referencing the instructions it was simple enough to put it together. I didn't like how my AirPods wont fit in the slot to charge with a case on them. I fixed this with a bit of tape under the sable sleeve to raise it up just enough to still charge them with a case on it. The other thing I didn't like was that it requires 3 separate cables for the three different devices. This means you'll need three separate power bricks. Just keep that in mind when you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mark Ellingson

customer_reviews.title: Not a three n 1 charging station you have to use ur
customer_reviews.text: We were under the impression that this was a three in one charging station and once we got it and tried to put it together we have to use our own cords to still charge our stuff this was a gift for my daughter and she wasn’t happy will move on to charging pad
customer_reviews.author: Katherine F.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and easy to put together. Bc our daughter likes to use her phone while on charge, with this product, although you may still use it you must keep it in the docking station. Otherwise it’s an awesome product for an all in one charging dock.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Looks nice on night stand
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, cords are hidden, sits the watch and phone so you can see at a glance . Docks easy, but when you remove phone, cord tends to come up a bit with phone, but drops back in place. This could be an install mistake on my end, going to double check instructions. This is not a game changer still give 5 stars..... Was going to be Christmas present but will be keeping for myself.
customer_reviews.author: D Rowan

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this thing
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this was going to be a snazzy addition to my bedside table. Unfortunately, it just ended up being more annoying than useful. The cords had a really hard time staying in the slots on the bottom of the base, and the slightest bit of movement (i.e. grabbing my phone off in the morning) would cause everything else to come tumbling off or for the cords to get ripped out of place. 2 stars because I still like the idea of this product, but it just ended up collecting dust because of how much of a pain it was.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This stand its the best!!! Yes you need your own cables.. But still great.. Perfect for keeping all your stuff together.. I love how aesthetic it looks! The material its great quality!! I just love it.! If you lime your stuff organized this is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cable Managment
customer_reviews.text: Cable management sucks you’re going to have 3 cords going through that so they are going to have to into a wall plug that has 3 or more USB ports. It’s nice but all those cords are not what I wanted. I ended up returning because I barely used it and it did mess up one of my lightening cable. Overall, it was easy to assemble but just created a cable management nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Won’t work with airpods case, and apple watch would fall off
customer_reviews.text: My apple watch would fall off, and it didn’t work with my Airpods cause it has a case that’s making it thicker and the charger won’t reach the charging slot. Also cable management didn’t look the best in this thing... not for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope you have an extension cord
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes of better organizing my nightstand to charge all my accessories in one place. Turns out this stand only makes things worse. Now I’ve got three short cords all needing to be plugged into my wall. Had to buy an extension cord in order to charge all three accessories at once. My girlfriend thinks I’m an idiot for spending $25 on this trash.
customer_reviews.author: Alessia F.

customer_reviews.title: It feels good quality
customer_reviews.text: This design is very simple feeling good, all kinds of charging line cleaning off, desktop clean relaxed a lot of, it is very nice, fast charging, next time will come, is worth having, useful one place can charge up, logistics soon, fine workmanship, charging is convenient, fast, use convenient to carry on a business trip, high safety coefficient, good convenient very good, feel the quality is good also, security is very good, very convenient also.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Organized
customer_reviews.text: My teen bought this for all her apple products. It is a great way to be orgainzed while having a space to charge all her items. It looks nice on her desk. NOT travel friendly though because you need to unplug and transport all your charging wires though
customer_reviews.author: Verona8122

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised when it arrived. It came with two chargers that wasn't included in the description which was nice. The set-up was confusing, so I needed my dad to assist me. He was able to figure out, so it could be my lack of engineering skills. Looks really nice and organized with all of my devices. It was hard to find a charging organizer that didn't have a wireless charger for my phone. I don't like the wireless chargers because it charges really slow, but this one has a wire input.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Dao

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: This charges your phone and watch really quickly, I was super surprised. I thought it would lag like the first one I bought did, but, that is not the case. It is pretty compact too which is also nice as you can charge three things in one tiny area.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it there is better out there
customer_reviews.text: I was fully aware that it did not have cords and was only a stand to hold it all together. However it is not sturdy. My phone falls regularly and my watch loses connection consistently. The air pods do just fine. Not worth the money or hassle
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. He loves it. We were traveling and lost the piece that connects to the AirPods. We contacted the seller and they responded the same night. They shipped us another stand which is great, but I wish we could of just got a replacement part or have multiple AirPod pieces that come with it. Regardless, the stand is great. You don’t have to worry about if your phone has a case because there are 4 different pieces that you can try to adjust the stand. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and looks good on my table. I was tired of looking at the messy wires all over my house. After some research, I found this. Love it so much I took it on my winter trip. It makes the place looks so organized. My opinion: don't waste your money on suggested retail price. This is a definite thing and at lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: It's very good to recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I’ve spent money left and right on chargers for years. I either end up losing them or having issues down the line. But once I bought this product everything was made simple. It so convinient to have all of your chargers in one spot. If a clean and organized desk and stylized functionality are important to you, give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Stand ONLY; use 3 current cords
customer_reviews.text: Good price but read fine print. I didn’t know your existing charging cords needed to be used in the stand. The stand has 3 cords coming out of the back and is a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Bfx

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Stand works exactly as expected. I like that it keeps my devices and cords neat and organized. Everything has a place to sit while charging instead of just laying on the floor. You do need to use apple cords, 5he after market cords I tried to use first wouldn't fit through the openings.
customer_reviews.author: momme

customer_reviews.title: Only works well with original Apple chargers
customer_reviews.text: Must have original apple charger for the iPhone charger to work as the iPhone charger hole is small. If you have a rope cord charger it will not work. Same for the cord slots, must have original apple chargers for it to fit flat on the desk. Overall, not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: requires assembly! only compatible with apple charging cords
customer_reviews.text: maybe my mistake but was very surprised to open the box to a bunch of little parts and a SCREWDRIVER?? luckily I'm relatively handy and instructions are decent - but wasn't expecting that and likely would not have chosen this if I had known - other than that it seems to be very well designed and looks nice. another thing to note, as chargers/cords break and you acquire new ones that may not be apple/the original cord you get with a phone or your airpods - these will not fit! only apple white cords fit
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great charging stand!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. It meets my needs, and is quite sturdy. I would be comfortable traveling with this without much worry about it breaking. I have a smaller Apple Watch, and it stays on the charger just fine. I can keep the thick case on my iPhone while charging it. There is some assembly involved, but the directions are good, and it was easy. I would absolutely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money buy Apple model
customer_reviews.text: The material is very poor quality and seems cheap especially for the price. Apple sells one slightly more expensive and I regret bit just buying great one as this one broke within 3 months as it fell from my nightstand as the cord was stuck to my Apple phone.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Z

customer_reviews.title: This product is good, strongly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a similar model at a friends house while visiting and thought what a great idea. This one arrived in 2 days and was simple to assemble. It works just as described. No more ugly cords next to the bed. All original Apple cords fit perfectly and even my after market cord for my phone. Very steady won’t tip over. I really like the cable management system on the bottom well thought out. I would recommend this to everyone. Very solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Posner

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with aftermarket wires
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find a station that can charge all Apple products has been a very difficult task. Seems like they can only be used with authentic Apple wires. Any after market wire doesn’t fit thru the opening of this base.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2three

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would make charging all of my products easier and this is very helpful! It neatly compacts all the wires down the back so they aren’t going every direction and it’s easy to just sit each product on their spot to charge. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Casey F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is easy to set up, although I did have some strike figuring out how to et all the cords to seamlessly go through. But now that I’ve figured it out, I love it! Makes the surface look clean and simple!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of having all my devices in the same organized space charging at the same time. The only thing that worked for me was watch stand. My 6+ wih case was too big for stand. It’s a pain to take your case off every time you want to charge your phone. Also charge spot didn’t work for my knock-off apple ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: DLA

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little stand!
customer_reviews.text: I have an Apple watch and iPhone 11 Pro Max, but not airpods. I love the adjustable backing for the phone so no matter what case or attachments you might have on your phone, you can move the backing for the perfect fit. (BTW, the airpod space - it's great for holding small jewelry overnight!)
customer_reviews.author: DGreen

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Stand
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about you, but I skim through the product description and I liked the way this dock looked - I thought it was metal. It is matte black plastic, but I think I like it better! Holds everything as it should and has lots of little plastic clips to fit different sized iPhone cases. I would totally recommend it for a nightstand! My only complaint is that I had non-Apple charging cords for the AirPods and iPhone. This dock only fits Apple manufactured cords. I wish the clips that held the cables in place were a little more flexible to allow for other types to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing. Annoying to use.
customer_reviews.text: The product is great to keep everything organized and looking good, however getting the phone or AirPods off the charger is always a struggle bc the cords pull out of the base and then I have to pull them out through underneath to be able to put everything back on the chargers again, kinda annoying but like I said nice for organization and looking tidy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hacking Device?
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than I expected. Easy to install But A weird thing happened after I installed all my apple devices. I received a call from a 1800496#### number saying it's a call from Apple Tech support saying my device has been compromised and to select 1 to talk for tech support . I did not. I checked the # and it was a China 1800 number. Knowing that this product is made in China gives me the creeps on how they were able to call my number. I'm having second thoughts on security using this product
customer_reviews.author: DARE To Be

customer_reviews.title: Functional and clean!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this thing. There are several attachments that are super helpful in tailoring the charging station to your specific versions of apple products, which is great. Only downside is that I have to remove my airpod case in order to charge them. Other than that, really enjoying having all of my charging cables centralized and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Martindale

customer_reviews.title: I had trouble mounting my Iphone
customer_reviews.text: I can see that this could possibly be a very good charger for someone who doesn't use a case on their phone or watch. I own a case with a flap that covers the charging port that made it hard to mound and also just found it difficult to get the phone plugged in. I also have a case on my watch and found that my watch slid off easily. I tried to make it work but ultimately decided that it wasn't right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Conley

customer_reviews.title: Like this! Stylish base for all my devices
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised that this product is designed to be very slim and provides the ability to charge all three devices at the same time. It is easy to store for travel or install on my dressing table. Each charger can charge one device at the same time, so you can easily put the device on the dressing table and charge it without the wires that I really like. In addition, the phone fast charging is very suitable for fast wireless charging, which is very similar to me The other wireless chargers are different. Too much trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Segrave

customer_reviews.title: It’s an ok stand.
customer_reviews.text: This stand is ok. I was excited about it but after the first time week the phone wouldn’t sit right up against the rest regardless of how I adjusted it and plugging it in the charger didn’t always charge. I would have to detach and attach it a few times before it recognized it was on the charger. It’s an ok stand. I was just expecting a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: luv4shopping

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Coolest thing I’ve bought! The instructions that came along with the product made it super easy to install. It comes with a little screwdriver to put the pieces together and I’ve also used the video on the amazon page. I’m gonna buy one for my husband as well because he fell in love with it too. I love that it comes with a little piece to hold all your cables together so you don’t have a wire mess.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Just dont use a case.
customer_reviews.text: Right idea, bad execution. So if you have your phone in a case the lightening adapter does not protrude enough to fully insert into your phone to charge. Same with the airpods if you have the case in a protective covering. About the only item it could charge for me was the apple watch, defeating the purpose of the whole assembly.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: It's a good stand but if you have any cases on your phone or watch it is hard to plug up your devices. I have a rugged armour band and unicorn beetle phone case. I have to remove the case to charge up the phone as it's displayed in the picture. So just be aware
customer_reviews.author: Jerel

customer_reviews.title: Great nightstand device
customer_reviews.text: Great for permanent home. Bought 3 of these and out family loves them. I would not recommend this for trave. Bulky and many cords for travel. Would be easier to bring individual lightening charging cables.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap plastic stand. For the price it is certainly not worth it. You have to put your own chargers into the stand then plug them all in to an outlet. My son’s iPhone charger doesn’t even stay in the slot made for it, it slips out every time you try to plug it in so you have to pull the charger up through it in order to plug it in then set it in place. Just pointless to have a stand when it it easier to just have a free charger. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Caitrin Piscetello

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize all these devices
customer_reviews.text: All of these devices are no longer just laying around somewhere. Having a place for it makes it easier for me to find them when I need them again. The stand has a lot of adjustments to make sure all of the devices fit on the stand properly. The only downside is that the set up and adjusting is a bit complicated. Hopefully, the manufacturer will simplify it in their next design.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Li

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing this product for a while and once I got airpods I ordered this too! I love that everything fits so well together in one spot!! Super easy to put together and looks so polished.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Shimer

customer_reviews.title: Organized now!
customer_reviews.text: This device is sturdy and seamlessly blends into my desk, it's a great way to keep my devices organized. The charging function works well. Instructions were easy to follow. It was delivered fast.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this charging dock 3 stars. It works perfectly easy to put together. The reason I am giving it 3 stars because it requires 3 charges. I was under the impression it would be actually wireless. Could have been my mistakes didn’t really read the description. But if I would’ve known it requires 3 chargers would’ve not gotten. So I gave it to my boyfriend n he loves it
customer_reviews.author: jennisia Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always looking for ways/gadget to keep my night stand organize. This phone organizer is the best! It was really easy to set up I got the new iPhone 11 and I’m in love with the wireless charging. It’s charges super fast all while having my son’s phone connected to the regular plug, my headphones and my Apple Watch. Everything charges super good and fast!! I looove that I can also use the wireless charger for my headphones. I got it in black so the decor is just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: jose j herrera

customer_reviews.title: Glorified stand
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected . It is just a plastic stand and you still have to use 3 different cords with 3 chargers for your phone , air pods and Apple Watch. I would definitely pass on this otem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is basically just a holder. You still have to plug all of the chargers into the outlet. I was expecting something that charged all of my devices. You’re basically paying for a piece of plastic. Wasn’t worth it. I would have been willing to pay like $5 for it. Not $20+
customer_reviews.author: Rogersd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sweetest Day Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves it. Personally, I don't like cords all over the floor or out in the open because I have two dogs, one 3 year old and one 11 week old. This was the perfect gift to keep all the cords tucked away from the pups. It's very convenient and compact for everyday use and travel. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Imani

product_meta.title: BEACOO Stand for iwatch 5, Charging Stand Dock Station for AirPods Stand Charging Docks Holder, Support for iwatch 5/4/3/2/1 NightStand Mode and for iPhone 11/X/7/7plus/SE/5s/6S
feature_bullets: Compatible with all versions of Apple Watch SERIES 3/2 and Apple Watch SERIES 1 (38mm & 42mm) and iPhoneX/iPhone8/iPhone7/iphone7plus/SE/5/5S/5C/6/plus/6s/6s plus/iPad MINI，and Airpods/ Airpods 2;
For Apple Watch Stand -Put for Apple Watch in the highest position on the stand at a 45-degree angle to enable the nightstand mode so that you can easily read time and more;

For iPhone Charging Stand - Showcases your device for sturdy, hands-free interaction like Face Time or Skype, supporting for iPhone with different thickness of cases (fit for 99% of cases in market), such as Spigen, Speck Candyshell, Griffin Reveal, Otterbox and Lifeproof. Innovative silicone spot design allows the phone to be placed horizontally without scratching the edge of the phone or blocking the contents on the screen, especially when using a full-screen phone (such as for iPhoneX);
For Stand Airpods – Admirably-designed groove based on Airpods' shape to perfectly fit for Airpods in a stable and elegant manner;

Compatible with Apple original lightning cable and new AmazonBasics Lightning cable (3 feet) with the same size of lightning plug (cannot guarantee 100% applicable for all AmazonBasics Lightning cables; if your cable doesn’t fit the slot well, please use Apple’s original one). ATTN: IPHONE, APPLE WATCH, AIRPODS, APPLE LIGHTNING CABLE, AND APPLE MAGNETIC CHARGER SHOWN IN IMAGES ARE FOR USAGE DEMONSTRATION PURPOSES ONLY AND ARE NOT INCLUDED WITH THIS PRODUCT.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars4,131 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
